mapper.insert: insert into leave_voucher (cause, create_sn, create_time, next_deal_sn, total_days, status) values (#{cause}, #{createSn}, #{createTime}, #{nextDealSn}, #{totalDays}, #{status})
mapper.select: select lv.*, le.name lname, le.post lpost, d.name dname, d.post dpost from leave_voucher lv left join employee le on le.sn = lv.create_sn left join employee d on d.sn = lv.next_deal_sn where lv.id = #{id}

select lv.*, le.name cname, le.post lpost, d.name dname, d.post dpost from leave_voucher lv left join employee le on le.sn = lv.create_sn left join employee d on d.sn = lv.next_deal_sn where lv.create_sn = #{csn} order by lv.create_time desc

select lv.*, le.name lname, le.post lpost, d.name dname, d.post dpost from leave_voucher lv left join employee le on le.sn = lv.create_sn left join employee d on d.sn = lv.next_deal_sn where lv.next_deal_sn = #{ndsn} order by lv.create_time desc
